1117871945549144067.text: Eth 2.0 is our "space race" moment, and I don't believe I'm being hyperbolic when I say it could change the course of history. It's time for all core devs, dapp devs, investors, users, and community members to come together to support this vision and figure out how you can help.

1090328307089002496.text:
ERC-1724 - zkERC20: Confidential Token Standard 

A common interface for fungible tokens that want to implement confidential transaction functionalities via zero-knowledge proofs and a corresponding Cryptography Engine (see ERC-1732).https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/1724 …

1040623394327289856.text:
Note from the Polymath Devs:

We have split the original EIP into two separate EIPs (EIP 1410: Partially Fungible Token Standard & EIP 1400: Security Token Standard):

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/1411 …
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/1410 …

Go provide some feedback! This is a community-driven standard!
